Title: Mugen Injection
Description: A lightweight and fast managed IoC (Inversion of Control) and DI (Dependency Injection) with support for constructor, property, field, and method call injection
HomeWiki:
Project Description

The MugeniInjection is a lightweight and fast managed IoC (Inversion of Control) and DI (Dependency Injection) with support for constructor, property and method call injection. For more information, see the documentation and examples.
If you have any ideas for future releases write them here.

Supported platforms:

  • NET 2.0 - 4.5
  • WinRT
  • Silverlight 4-5
  • Windows phone 7.1-8.0
  • MVC 2-4
  • WCF

Extensions:

  • NServiceBus.ObjectBuilder
  • Interceptors
  • Xml configuration
  • Log4Net
  • NLog2
